name: Extreme Car Stunts: Master Dri
description:
Do you like driving fast and doing amazing jumps? You can do everything! Drive super fast powerful RC sports cars on extreme stunts jumps and tricks in the detailed house environment! Go drive fast cars, use supercharged boosts, pull off rubber burning drift, flip, roll, jump, and crash your RC car to experience one of the most amazing RC extreme car racing games!

Features:
•Awesome sports cars
•Fantasy stunt city
•Extreme precision driving simulator
•Realistic driving experience
•Awesome 3D graphics
